name: Pixel Invasion (ArthuroX65, X36Granitplate, ChristianEnders, QuarkTasche, Ratastic, KalinaDimitrova)
name_original: Pixel Invasion (ArthuroX65, X36Granitplate, ChristianEnders, QuarkTasche, Ratastic, KalinaDimitrova)
description:
Welcome!

survive dangerous invasions as long as you can.

We're Arthur, Granit, Tim, Christian, Celina and Kalina and we're proud to present our game. This game was made within a few days for the annual HTK academy GameJam - with the topic

 "Arcade".

shoot the dangerous invasive ships and survive the waves.

 Get the PowerUp's and upgrade your ship with more guns.

The longer you survive the waves, the more your score increases.

Hopefully you'll enjoy our little game and we're always looking for some feedback! :)
